list.listitem: Bertha Benz(18491944), German marketing entrepreneur who was the first to drive an automobile for a long distance, wife of Karl Benz
Derek Benz(b. 1971), American author of fantasy fiction for children
Karl Benz(18481929), German engineer, inventor, and entrepreneur who built the first patented automobile in 1885
Larry Benz(b. 1941), former American football player
Maria Benz (19061946), the birth name ofNusch luard, German-born model who married Paul luard
Walter Benz(b. 1931), German mathematician known for his work on geometric planes
Nicky Benz, ring name ofNick Berk(b. 1980), American wrestler
Nikki Benz, stage name of Alla Montchak (b. 1981), Canadian actress and director
Spragga Benz, stage name of Carlton Grant (b. 1969), Jamaican deejay and musician
Abbreviated form ofBenzo, a functional group in chemistry
Automotive brands:Benz & Cie.Karl Benz#Benz Shne (1906 to 1923)Benz ShneDaimler-BenzMercedes-Benz
Benz series, a series of paintings and drawings created byLyonel Feininger
